donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: This project support is formulated within the CCPD/UNDAP's context, which is anchored on MKUZA II. Advisory function and mechanism in the President's Office strenghthened to provide the President with access to evidnce-based advice on policy options, systems change and reforms; President's Office-CRC communication and coordination mechanisms established and operational; First Vice President's Office strategic plan developed and implemented; Second Vice-President's Office coordination mechanism established and implemented; Planning Commission puts in place streamlined processes that facilitate coordination, resource mobilization and programming of MKUZA II implementation plan; Implementing Units in MDGs and LGAs adapted new processes for implementation planning, execution and reporting on development projects under MKUZA II
